sentences.en: Color foam, fireproof foam, rubber foam and anti - static form.
sentences.cn: 颜色泡棉, 防火泡棉, 橡胶泡棉,抗静电泡棉.

sentences.en: It contains a fireproof lining to extinguish cigarettes and lock in odour.
sentences.cn: 它还含有耐火内衬,以熄灭香烟,并锁定气味.

sentences.en: It is impossible to make the office completely fireproof.
sentences.cn: 使办公室做到完全防火是不可能的.

sentences.en: Middle sized fireproof aluminum ball is used to ensure the applying strength.
sentences.cn: 耐火铝球采用中铝球以保证其使用强度.

sentences.en: Polymer functional film coat was used on fireproof fire - coverlet.
sentences.cn: 采用高分子功能膜涂覆石棉织物.

sentences.en: Safe - deposit boxesare kept in vaults are usually burglar - proof and fireproof.
sentences.cn: 贵重物品保管箱通常存放在 防盗 、防火的保险库中.

sentences.en: Sand Island The heat is incredible. Where are the fireproof suits?
sentences.cn: 太热了(指着火区域). 防火服在哪儿?

sentences.en: The fireproof paint shows good burning resistance and decoration properties.
sentences.cn: 该防火涂料具有较好的耐火性能和装饰性能.

sentences.en: The float is made of fiber - reinforced plastics, making it light and fireproof.
sentences.cn: 该彩车车身由纤维增强塑料制成, 使其轻质而防火.

sentences.en: The invention relates a non drying organic fireproof paint and preparation method.
sentences.cn: 本发明涉及一种不干性有机防火堵料及其制备方法.

sentences.en: The product is made of fireproof voltage withstand material.
sentences.cn: 产品用防火耐压材料制成.

sentences.en: This building, made entirely of steel and concrete, is fireproof.
sentences.cn: 这所房屋完全用“钢筋”水泥建造, 是可以防火的.

sentences.en: Those tapes are then kept in a locked, fireproof storage area.
sentences.cn: 然后把磁带锁在防火存储区.

sentences.en: Used for fireproof roll curtains and fire doors in the building industry.
sentences.cn: 建筑行业用于防火卷帘门、防火门.

trans.tran_en: a building, piece of cloth etc that is fireproof cannot be badly damaged by flames
